import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import DisplayError from './DisplayError' import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; const initialState = { data: { skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '', cfUserName: '', cfRating: '', cfMaxRating: '', cfRank: '', ccUserName: '', ccRating: '', ccMaxRating: '', ccRank: '' }, errors: { cfUserNameError: '', ccUserNameError: '', collegeError: '', }, } function AddProfile(){ const [ profile, setProfile ] = useState({ data: { skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '', cfUserName: '', cfRating: '', cfMaxRating: '', cfRank: '', cfMaxRank: '', cfProfile: '', ccUserName: '', ccRating: '', ccMaxRating: '', ccStars: '', ccProfile: '', githubUserName: '' }, errors: { cfUserNameError: '', ccUserNameError: '', githubUserName: '', batchError: '' }, }) const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() let cfUserNameError='', ccUserNameError='', githubUserNameError='', batchError='' let res1, res2, res3; try{ res1 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codeforces/${profile.data.cfUserName}`) if(res1.data.status==='Failed'){ cfUserNameError = 'Please enter valid codeforces user handle' } res2 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codechef/${profile.data.ccUserName}`) if(res2.data.status==='Failed'){ ccUserNameError = 'Please enter valid codechef user handle' } res3 = await axios.get(`https://api.github.com/users/${profile.data.githubUserName}/repos`) } catch ( error ){ if(error.response.data.message==='Not Found'){ githubUserNameError = 'Please enter valid github username' } } if( cfUserNameError || ccUserNameError || githubUserNameError ) { return setProfile({ ...profile, errors: { cfUserNameError, ccUserNameError, githubUserNameError } }) } //const { username, rating, max_rating, } = res1.data setProfile({...profile, data:{ ...profile.data, cfRating: res1.data.rating, cfMaxRating: res1.data.['max rating'], cfRank: res1.data.rank, cfMaxRank: res1.data.['max rank'], cfProfile: `https://codeforces.com/profile/${profile.data.cfUserName}` }}) setProfile({...profile, data:{ ...profile.data, ccRating: res2.data.rating, ccMaxRating: res2.data.highest_rating, ccStars: res2.data.stars, ccProfile: `https://www.codechef.com/users/${profile.data.ccUserName}` }}) console.log(res1.data) console.log(res2) console.log(res3) console.log(profile.data) const { portfolio, linkedIn, facebook, instagram, twitter, skills } = profile try { const config = { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'auth-token': localStorage.getItem('token') } } const body1 = { portfolio, linkedIn, facebook, instagram, twitter, skills } //const body2 = { } //const res1 = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/profile', body, config) //const res2 = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/profile/codeforcesProfile', ) } catch (error) { } } return (

) } export default AddProfile;
